title: Simply Chiropractic & Acupuncture
author: Simply Chiropractic; Acupuncture
description: Offering 25+ years of holistic chiropractic care. Bringing a hands on approach to improving your health by offering multiple ways to approach each problem. Chiropractor in Gray Summit
cleaned_text: SIMPLY put, a chiropractor is a healthcare worker that provides a difference aproach to curing physical ailments. Dr. Cheri personally takes a holistic approach to curing the human body, straying away from medicine. As said by Thomas A. Edison: "The doctor of the future will give no medicine but will interest their patients in the care of the human frame, diet, and in the cause & prevention of disease." With years of experience, Dr. Cheri understands and knows first hand how environmental and lifestyle factors influence the progression of disease. She practices holistic wellness using chiropractic & acupuncture and is trained in several complementary modalities. Dr. Cheri understands the importance of offering different techniques to match the needs of her patients. Some including acupuncture, Thompson, drop table, diversified, activator, applied kinesiology, which all together allow us to work on newborns, to seniors, to elite athletes. Dr. Cheri is knowledgeable in spinal and chiropractic adjustments. The purpose of spinal adjustments is to return the spine to a natural state of health and to reduce pain, muscle spasms, and nerve irritation, so you can enjoy your life pain free. Acupuncture is a safe means of therapy. It is not addictive, non-toxic, has no adverse side effects, and it has been with us for over 5,000 years. Address the whole person in spinal correction and nutritional sciences.
